General.Name: TROPHY GAMES Development AS
General.Description: TROPHY GAMES Development A/S engages in the developing, manufacturing, publishing, and selling of online games for computers, tablet, mobiles, and related products in Denmark. It primarily focuses on football management games. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

0.Name: Mr. Soren Westrup Gleie
0.Title: Co-Founder, CEO, Member of Exec. Board  & Director
